title: Wallet Authentication With Cronos
description: Cronos is the first EVM-compatible chain built on Cosmos. Together, we'll setup and authenticate our Cronos account, then fund it with a faucet.

title: Web3 Magic Treasure Chest on  the cronos chain
description: Together, we'll create a Web3 Magic Treasure Chest game for Unity with Cronos.

title: Add Cronos to a Sim City Web3 game
description: Cronos is the first EVM-compatible chain built on Cosmos. Together, we'll add Cronos to the Sim City Web3 game for Unity!

title: Cronos Account API - Get Balance and NFTs
description: Cronos is the first EVM-compatible chain built on Cosmos.  Together, we'll call the Web3 API to get balance info, get NFTs, and more!

title: How to create your first Token on Cronos
description: In this video I will teach you how you can create your first Cronos Token with the DexPad Token Factory! It will take you up to 10 minutes and it's very easy to understand.I also talk about the new scam method on cronos and what you should do to avoid scams and rugpulls on the Cronos Chain.

title: Creating dapps on Cronos Chain
description: Cronos Developer Workshop Pt.1: Creating dapps on Cronos Chain
